results.title: DS 9-10 REST OF WORLD COST TRENDS (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.creator: Acrobat PDFMaker 25 for Word

results.title: DS 9-3 USA and CANADA (excl. PUERTO RICO) COST TRENDS (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.creator: Acrobat PDFMaker 25 for Word

results.title: DS 9-16 Burglary and Theft (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Addresses the subject of burglary and theft losses in manufacturing and warehouse facilities, and, to a limited extent, mercantile locations.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 9-0 Asset Integrity (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Provide guidance for developing cost effective loss prevention maintenance and inspection programs for facilities, systems, and equipment, with guidance for evaluating the adequacy of existing maintenance and inspection programs.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 9-1 Supervision of Property (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Discusses the supervision of property and its relationship with loss prevention and mitigation, including recommendations and discussion of security and alarm services.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 9-18 Prevention of Freeze-Ups (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Discusses preventive measures to avoid freeze-ups of equipment and property exposed to below freezing weather and presents a loss analysis for properties by geographic location and type of occupancy.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 9-19 Wildland Fire (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Provides recommendations on how to mitigate the exposure from bushfire, a term which encompasses forest fires, grass fires and brush fires.
results.creator: XPP

results.file_path: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial/FMDS0621.pdf
results.folder: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial
results.title: DS 6-21 Chemical Recovery Boilers (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Recommendations for the design, operation and maintenance of chemical recovery boilers utilized in the pulp and paper industry.
results.creator: XPP

results.file_path: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial/FMDS0609.pdf
results.folder: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial
results.title: DS 6-9 Industrial Ovens and Dryers (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Addresses the inherent fire and explosion hazards in industrial ovens and dryers from fuel, process combustibles and flammable volatiles
results.creator: XPP

results.file_path: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial/FMDS0622.pdf
results.folder: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial
results.title: DS 6-22 Firetube Boilers (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Covers firetube boilers used to supply steam for a given process, except those used in marine and locomotive applications, with recommendations intended to prevent losses involving firetube boilers.
results.creator: XPP

results.file_path: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial/FMDS0623.pdf
results.folder: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial
results.title: DS 6-23 Watertube Boilers (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Discusses the hazards of direct-contact evaporators and the associated flue gas processing equipment for black liquor recovery boilers, with recommendations to control or prevent fires in these units, which use water of steam as the extinguishing agent.
results.creator: XPP

results.file_path: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial/FMDS0600.pdf
results.folder: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial
results.title: DS 6-0 Elements of Industrial Heating Equipment (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Discusses the fundamentals of combustion, methods for fuel-air mixing, and types of burners as they pertain to industrial heating equipment, including combustion controls, safeguard functions, and recommended maintenance test procedures.
results.creator: XPP

results.file_path: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial/FMDS0614.pdf
results.folder: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial
results.title: DS 6-14 Heat Recovery Boilers (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Covers waste heat boilers, which are units that recover sensible heat from industrial processes and combustion products.
results.creator: XPP

results.file_path: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial/FMDS0617.pdf
results.folder: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial
results.title: DS 6-17 Rotary Kilns and Dryers (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Covers rotary kilns (refractory-lined) usually operating above 1700 degrees F (950 degrees C), rotary dryers (not refractory-lined) operating at lower temperatures and vertical kilns and vertical annular shaft kilns.
results.creator: XPP

results.file_path: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial/FMDS0603.pdf
results.folder: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial
results.title: DS 6-3 Induction and Dielectric Heating Equipment (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Addresses the industrial use of induction heating equipment, including elecromagnetic induction heaters and dielectric heaters.
results.creator: XPP

results.file_path: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial/FMDS0602.pdf
results.folder: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial
results.title: DS 6-2 Pulverized Coal-Fired Boilers (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Addresses the hazards associated with the firing of pulverized coal (anthracite, bituminous, sub-bituminous or lignite) in multiple-burner boilers.
results.creator: XPP

results.file_path: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial/FMDS0612.pdf
results.folder: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial
results.title: DS 6-12 Low-Water Protection for Boilers (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Provides recommendations for the application, installation, testing and maintenance of low-water protection equipment/systems on boilers, to reduce the hazard of dry-firing.
results.creator: XPP

results.file_path: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial/FMDS0606.pdf
results.folder: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial
results.title: DS 6-6 Boiler-Furnace Implosions (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Discusses the prevention of implosions associated with boiler furnaces, including the problems encountered with the fuel burning system, air supply/gas removal system, and the interlocks and alarms built into the control system.
results.creator: XPP

results.file_path: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial/FMDS0607.pdf
results.folder: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial
results.title: DS 6-7 Fluidized Bed Boilers (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Describes the hazards associated with combustion of fuel in fluidized bed combustors and boilers, applicable only to atmospheric type fluidized bed combustor-boilers.
results.creator: XPP

results.file_path: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial/FMDS0613.pdf
results.folder: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial
results.title: DS 6-13 Waste Fuel-Fired Facilities (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Covers the firing of "waste"-type fuels in boilers, divided into sections on gaseous, liquid, and solid types of fuel.
results.creator: XPP

results.file_path: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial/FMDS0605.pdf
results.folder: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial
results.title: DS 6-5 Oil- and Gas-Fired Multiple Burner Boilers (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Discusses primarily the hazards associated with the firing of natural gas and standard grades of fuel oil in multiple burner boilers.
results.creator: XPP

results.file_path: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial/FMDS0611.pdf
results.folder: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial
results.title: DS 6-11 Thermal and Regenerative Catalytic Oxidizers (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Discusses thermal and catalytic oxidizers with fuel inputs (auxiliary fuel and process vapors) greater than 400,000 Btu/hr (117 kW) and all incinerators, critical to a process, that do not have a backup.
results.creator: XPP

results.file_path: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial/FMDS0610.pdf
results.folder: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial
results.title: DS 6-10 Process Furnaces (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Discusses the fire and explosion hazards inherent in gas- or oil-fired furnaces, flammable special atmosphere furnaces and special atmosphere gas generators, including recommendations for the installation, maintenance and operation.
results.creator: XPP

results.file_path: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial/FMDS0604.pdf
results.folder: FM Calderas y equipos de calefacción industrial
results.title: DS 6-4 Oil- and Gas-Fired Single-Burner Boilers (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Discusses the fuel hazards inherent in gas-fired or oil-fired single-burner boilers, covering automaatic and supervised manual single-burner boilers rated greater than 400,000 Btuh (117 kW) input, including recommendations for the installation, maintenance.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 13-10 Land-Based Wind Turbines and Farms (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Presents guidelines and recommendations for land-based wind turbines, typically part of a wind farm or wind park, used to generate electrical power.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 13-7 Gears (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Covers gears and gear sets in mechanical power transmission systems, including a description of types, construction, fabrication by welding and materials, information on installation, lubrication, gear failures and recommendations for loss prevention.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 13-3 Steam Turbines (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Provides loss prevention information for electric power generation and mechanical drive applications, with loss prevention recommendations applicable to physical protection, testing and dismantle inspection and substantiation for the recommendations.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 13-17 Gas Turbines (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Provides loss prevention recommendations for industrial gas turbines, both heavy-duty industrial types and aeroderivatives, including internal (but not external) fires and explosions in gas turbines.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 13-18 Industrial Clutches and Clutch Couplings (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Describes various designs of industrial clutches and clutch couplings, with recommendations for inspection maintenance programs.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 13-24 Fans and Blowers (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: This data sheet deals with loss prevention in fans and blowers.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 13-26 Internal Combustion Engines (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Applies to the inspection and maintenance of gaseous or liquid fueled reciprocating internal combustion engines (ICEs) 3 500 hp (373 kW).
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 13-8 Power Presses (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Provides loss prevention data as it relates to the inspection and maintenance of hydraulically and mechanically powered presses, either vertically or horizontally positioned, used in the forming, extruding, punching, stretching, stamping or compacting.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 5-40 Fire Alarm Systems (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Discusses installation, operation, and maintenance of fire alarm systems. General guidelines relating to alarm systems are included, covering the operation and application of most systems.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 5-20 Electrical Testing (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Describes tests and testing intervals for electrical equipment rated above 240 V, to help determine an electrical system's condition and suitability for continued service.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 5-8 Static Electricity (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Describes how static electricity is generated in commercial and industrial operations where it is a potential fire and explosion hazard, including methods used for preventing its accumulation so as not to cause ignition.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 5-23 Design and Protection for Emergency and Standby Power Systems (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Describes the types, operation, and protection of emergency and standby power systems, and provides guidelines for their application.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 5-32 Data Centers and Related Facilities (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Covers the protection of mainframe electronic computer/information systems and major equipment or process control computer systems.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 5-33 Lithium-Ion Battery Energy Storage Systems (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Describes loss prevention recommendations for the desighn, operation, protection, inspection, maintenance, and testing of electrical energy storage systems (ESS) that use lithium-ion batteries.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 5-19 Switchgear and Circuit Breakers (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Describes the various types of switchgear assemblies, including switchboards, circuit breakers, and buses, including the hazards associated with this equipment and the safeguards that should be provided.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 5-31 Cables and Bus Bars (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Covers electrical protection and fire protection for cables and bus bars, including a discussion of aluminum conductors describing methods of connecting, splicing, and terminating to prevent excessive heating, which could result in arcing and fire.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 5-25 High Voltage Direct Current Converter Stations (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Presents loss prevention guidelines and recommendations for high voltage direct current (HVDC) converter stations
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 5-30 Power Factor Correction and Static Reactive Compensator Systems (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Discusses the relation of power factor to alternating current systems, the effect of low power factor on a transmission system or an industrial distribution system, and the methods employed in industry to correct power factor.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 5-1 Electrical Equipment in Hazardous (Classified) Locations (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Provides recommendations for preventing electrical systems or equipment from igniting flammable gases, flammable vapors and combustible dusts that may be released into the atmosphere, or that may be normally present in or near processing equipment.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 5-28 DC Battery Systems (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: This document provides design, operation, inspection, testing, and maintenance guidance for DC battery systems used for standby operations in stationary applications, including, but not limited to, power-generating stations, substations, telecommunications, data centers, switchgear protection systems, process control systems, emergency power supplies, and uninterruptable power supplies.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 5-14 Telecommunications (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Covers property protection recommendations for telephone central offices (TCO) and mobile telephone switching offices (MTSO).
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 5-17 Motors and Adjustable Speed Drives (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Provides protection guidelines for alternating and direct current motors 500 horsepower (HP) and larger, including associated drives of 500 HP and larger, drives vital to production, a preventive maintenance program and basic protection.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 5-3 Hydroelectric Power Plants (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Covers hydroelectric power installations of all sizes, including the various kinds of water turbines, their hazards and recommended safeguards.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 5-12 Electric AC Generators (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Covers electric alternating current (ac) generators of all sizes used in industrial and electric utility locations, including steam turbine, combustion turbine, and diesel engine driven generators, describing basic operation, protection, inspection, and maintenance.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 5-4 Transformers (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Provides electrical protection recommendations for the prevention of losses in power and distribution transformers, including fire protection recommendations for power, distribution, arc furnace and induction furnace transformers.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 5-11 Lightning and Surge Protection for Electrical Systems (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Describes modern procedures and practices for protecting industrial power distribution systems and associated equipment from damage caused by overvoltages due to lightning, switching, or some system abnormality.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 5-49 Gas and Vapor Detectors and Analysis Systems (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Discusses the basic methods of detecting gases or vapors and the general aspects of detection analysis systems, with references to data sheets concerning specific occupancies and hazards where the application of such detectors are recommended.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 5-48 Automatic Fire Detection (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Describes the basic types of automatic fire detectors and presents general guidelines for their installation and testing.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 10-4 Contractor Management (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Provides guidance for developing an effective program to manage contractors.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 10-5 Disaster Recovery Planning (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Provides guidance for the development of disaster recovery plans to ensure that viable recovery strategies are in place when disaster strikes.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 10-7 Fire Protection Impairment Management (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Provides guidance on managing impairments to fire protection systems that automatically or manually discharge fire extinguishing agents.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 10-6 Protection Against Arson and Other Incendiary Fires (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Discusses incendiary fires at industrial and commercial properties and presents recommendations for preventing or lessening the effect of such fires.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 10-3 Hot Work Management (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Provides guidance for developing an effective process to manage hot work operations, which can eliminate the potential for a loss due to hot work ignition.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 10-1 Pre-Incident and Emergency Response Planning (Data Sheet)
results.author: FM
results.subject: Provides guidance for the development of a pre-incident plan with the public fire service, which can significantly improve the probability of a public fire service agency successfully handling a fire emergency.
results.creator: XPP

results.title: DS 10-0 The Human Factor of Property Conservation (Data Sheet)
